Subsection.title: Design Principles
Subsection.Paragraph: The Changelog package provides a command-line interface and Java API for creating, modifying, and formatting software changelogs for display.

Subsection.title: Well-Specified XML Format
Subsection.Paragraph: The Changelog package stores changelog information in a strongly-specified XML format with a full XSD schema.

Subsection.title: Command-Line Interface
Subsection.Paragraph: The Changelog package provides a command-line interface for effortlessly maintaining changelogs.
